title: Strengthening Competencies in Mathematics Curriculum Mapping and Unit Guide System Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and understanding of fundamental curriculum design concepts
context.additional_context: Developing practical competencies for designing mathematics curricula and operating evaluation systems as current practitioners.

learning_goals: Operate a curriculum mapping tool with over 80% accuracy by applying Technology Acceptance Model (TAM)-based system utilization strategies
Independently produce core competency mapping documents for mathematics curriculum using a unit guide system at least three times
Propose at least two mathematics curriculum improvement plans applicable to real educational settings through project-based assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
